page.title: 14ATTITUDES/OVERTON+MIDDLETON
page.content: The old families of the parish,who can trace their ancestry back for 300 years or so,are now outnumbered by 2nd and 3rd generation villagers and newcomers. Many of the older generation regret the villageÂ£s growth and development,which threaten the character of the village, and increase the traffic flow.Though the rural charm has altered,the community spirit has been kept alive, and there are more opportunities for both young and old.The elders deplore the behaviour and lack of respect of some of the younger generation and their parents,they dislike the poor bus service,the lack of a local surgery,or chemistÂ£s shop.Some people worry about the proximity of the Nuclear Power Plant,the number of stray dogs,and the materialistic outlook of many young people in the area.
